channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows DVD Maker
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows DVD Maker

item.title: CVE-2017-0045|2024-08-05T12:47:57.599Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- windows%20dvd%20maker
item.description: Windows DVD Maker in Windows 7 SP1, Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1, and Windows Vista SP2 does not properly parse crafted .msdvd files, which allows attackers to obtain information to compromise a target system, aka "Windows DVD Maker Cross-Site Request Forgery Vulnerability."
